title: Unavailability of Bacillus Calmette Guerin for urology care
description: (Clinical Focus: Unavailability of Bacillus Calmette Guerin (BCG)  for urology care),(Data Element Scope: This data element defines the situation when Bacillis Calmette Guerin is not available for bladder cancer care.),(Inclusion Criteria: Situation when BCG is not available when needed),(Exclusion Criteria: BCG available for administration)
